message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.DB

Reasoning: The paper discusses the shortcomings of existing information resources and proposes the design and implementation of an integrated information system to support scientific research. This suggests a focus on digital libraries (cs.DL) and information retrieval (cs.IR) technologies. Additionally, the paper mentions the fragmentation of the scientific community, which could be addressed through the use of cybersecurity (cs.CY) and database (cs.DB) technologies. Finally, the paper may also touch on issues related to cryptography (cs.CR) in the context of securing scientific data.
